title.narrative: ICMPD. Capacity building for long-term reintegration of returnees in Afghanistan and Iraq. 2021-2023.

description.narrative: The overall objective of the development cooperation is to create conditions for sustainable reintegration of Afghan and Iraqi returnees, individuals as well as families, in their communities of return. The specific objectives are to: 1. Strengthen capacities of the MoRR (Afghanistan) and MoMD (Iraq), as well as of community based organisations in both countries for provision of extended reintegration support to a cohort of returnees to Afghanistan and Iraq, supported through ERRIN interventions, by creating linkages between the ongoing ERRIN efforts and development objectives of the communities; 2. Enhancing sustainability of reintegration efforts by creation of public-private collaborations and partnerships towards better access to employment opportunities for returnees, and better linkages between reintegration support and market needs.
